소꿉놀이 시간은 끝났다 : Playtime is over
꾐에 넘어갔나 보군 : Fell for the trick
모른 척 할 수 없었던 거예요 : Couldn't just ignore
큰일 날 뻔했네 : That was a close call
군림하는 : Reigns over

hangle: 본인의 욕망에 충실해서 원하는 건 가져야하는 성격인데다가,

idiom_translate: she's a character that is true to her desires and has to have what she wants.
